titleStmt.title: A warning to drunkards delivered in several sermons to a congregation in Colchester, upon the occasion of a sad providence towards a young man dying in the act of drunkenness / by ... Owen Stockton ...
titleStmt.author: Stockton, Owen, 1630-1680.
Fairfax, John, 1623-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Tho. Parkhurst ...,
